title: Ep. - 181 - BEHIND BRAVO HITS WITH PRODUCER MICHAEL BECK
description:
Michael Beck started his career in the entertainment industry at a very young age and has worked both in front and behind the camera as an actor, host, and producer. Over the last six years Beck has skyrocketed to success as a producer in unscripted television becoming one of the youngest working Showrunner/Executive Producers in the industry. His list of production credits include Bravo hits like The Real Housewives of Atlanta, The Real Housewives of Miami, The Real Housewives of New York City, The Real Housewives of Dallas, Don’t Be Tardy, Southern Charm & Married to Medicine. He gives insight into producing some of Bravo’s biggest shows, handling talent, and what makes the ideal archetype for a Real Housewife.


Comedian Jenna Brisker helps Kate review Fixer Upper on HGTV. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
